attributes.action: All lorries without road tax  that enter the UK should Be charged a road levy
attributes.background: U.K. based wagons pay road tax for the upkeep of U.K.  roads . Our neighbors charge tolls which U.K. wagons have to pay in addition to U.K. road tax  , non U.K. wagons should not be exempt from U.K. road tax

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure whether you would like non-UK lorries to be charged the full UK road tax or a special levy.

It's also not the case that all non-UK vehicles are exempt from road tax. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/importing-vehicles-into-the-uk/temporary-imports

You could start a new petition setting out clear what you'd like to happen. You'll also have to give your full name or surname and intial to start a petition.
